title: Market Wrap for the North American Session - June 26
description: June 26 NA Session Recap â€“ Broad USD weakness drove gains across major currencies and indices. Gold held firm above $3,300, while Oil rebounded modestly. Alternative metals surged, with Platinum and Palladium up over 6%. Cryptos remain flat, with Bitcoin steady above $100K.
